failure.message: --- expected +++ actual @@ -1 +1 @@ -"SELECT \\"hammerstone_contacts\\".* FROM \\"hammerstone_contacts\\" WHERE (\\"hammerstone_contacts\\".\\"id\\" IN (SELECT \\"hammerstone_contacts\\".\\"id\\" FROM \\"hammerstone_contacts\\" LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT \\"hammerstone_events\\".\\"hammerstone_contact_id\\", COUNT(*) AS hs_refine_count_aggregate FROM \\"hammerstone_events\\" WHERE (\\"hammerstone_events\\".\\"type\\" = 'Networking Event') GROUP BY \\"hammerstone_events\\".\\"hammerstone_contact_id\\") interim_table ON interim_table.\\"hammerstone_contact_id\\" = \\"hammerstone_contacts\\".\\"id\\" WHERE coalesce(hs_refine_count_aggregate, 0) = '0'))" +"SELECT `hammerstone_contacts`.* FROM `hammerstone_contacts` WHERE (`hammerstone_contacts`.`id` IN (SELECT `hammerstone_contacts`.`id` FROM `hammerstone_contacts` LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT `hammerstone_events`.`hammerstone_contact_id`, COUNT(*) AS hs_refine_count_aggregate FROM `hammerstone_events` WHERE (`hammerstone_events`.`type` = 'Networking Event') GROUP BY `hammerstone_events`.`hammerstone_contact_id`) interim_table ON interim_table.`hammerstone_contact_id` = `hammerstone_contacts`.`id` WHERE coalesce(hs_refine_count_aggregate, 0) = '0'))"
